thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by D.V

author: D.V
title: D.V
text: This is company I would like to recommend to anyone ,last year I choose this company because of my financial situation so I called there office made appointment we found best solution for me this year I am felling better that pressure what I had it is gone ,so making long story short I owning big thank you to the company special to Rhoda in Mississauga office helping me to the all process thank you and all the best D.V
